fields.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
fields.review: Top 10 greatest Marvel Studios movie of all time.

fields.title: One Day We'll Talk About Today
fields.review: It not only was a heart-warming tale but also a genuine and relatable film. With a simple premise and stellar performances, I would say that this is a film not to be overlooked

fields.title: Peninsula
fields.review: Not as good as the first one but at least set in the same universe.

fields.title: Check the Store Next Door
fields.review: A story about the ups and downs of each family members, each character can resonate with the audience in some way.

fields.title: Top Gun: Maverick
fields.review: It takes you on an emotional nostalgia filled thrill ride that will have you on the edge of your seat.

fields.title: Friend Zone
fields.review: Laugh and shed a tears in one movie with a such great chemistry between the characters.

fields.title: Hotel Mumbai
fields.review: Based on true events of Terrorist attack on Majestic Hotel Taj in Mumbai. This movie proves that Indians treat guests as God. Many people who died in the hotel were the hotel staff who stayed there to protect the guests.

fields.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
fields.review: This movie was truly encompassing of all emotions, along with profoundly polished animation, near flawless lip-syncing, and subtle and powerful moments of comedy

fields.title: Logan
fields.review: The character which we identify and about whom we cara, its not just great for a superhero movie, its a great movie for any genre.

fields.title: Miracle in Cell No. 7
fields.review: A heart-warming story about the relationship between a 6-year old girl and her mentally challenged father whose accused and convicted of a crime he didn't commit.
